topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5451e5d263687208a8670000#post_5451e5d263687208a8670000
Asura as a character is just too over the top for me take seriously 
It also has this issue of scale where the first boss is several times larger than the planet
And then every other thing is your size
Like generally it helps to use scale to get across power

Also the true ending and final boss are dlc
Fuck that

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54527dbc6368721781600200#post_54527dbc6368721781600200
Thoughts on them so far?
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54527dd76368723273df0100#post_54527dd76368723273df0100

well.

karkat is an annoying assclow, probably the least one i like so far.
tavros is strangely cute and i really feel bad for the poor guy.
im sure you already know my stance on terezi.
kanaya is also one of my favorites since she atleast isnt hotheaded and goes for more rational approaches.
vriska also annoys me for some reason, maybe is the way she talks.
gamzee is so far cool, his stoned personality is kinda funny.
nepeta a cutie.
and i dont got anything for the rest, maybe they need to be introduced better
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc
